entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Shawinigan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:58 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shawinigan 04:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: E 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Rain or snow. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow or freezing rain changing to rain this morning then to snow this afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending before morning then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
